mapper.sql: id, language, code, judgeResult, maxTime, maxMemory, caseInfoList, questionId, questionNum, questionTitle, userId, userName, createTime, updateTime, isDelete
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) AS submitCount, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN judgeResult = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS acceptCount, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN judgeResult = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS wrongCount, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN judgeResult = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS timeLimitCount, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN judgeResult = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS memoryLimitCount, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN judgeResult = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS compileErrorCount, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN judgeResult = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS runtimeErrorCount FROM question_submit WHERE userName = #{userName}
